settings.text: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

settings.title: what does 100% plant based mean?
settings.text: When a formula is 100% plant based it simply means that ALL of the ingredients are derived from plants and that is all!

settings.title: what does natural mean?
settings.text: Simply put something is “natural” if it occurs in nature – and is not synthesized in a factory or lab. There are MANY cosmetic ingredients that are considered “natural” but are not skin healthy such as paraffin wax and mineral oil, which derived from petroleum.

settings.title: what does vegan mean?
settings.text: A product is vegan if it contains no animal based ingredients. Toxic petrochemicals like glycols and phenoxyethanol are vegan.

settings.title: what does way beyond clean mean
settings.text:
100% plant based formula

no glycols: glycols are derived from petroleum and known to cause irritation

no petrochemicals

no synthetic fragrance

no added dye or color

vegan* and cruelty-free

made by us

no parabens

no phthalates

*all of our products are vegan with the exception of those containing honey.

settings.title: why water-form is better?
settings.text:
Water is called the ‘elixir of life’ because all life forms depend on the miracle of water. It only makes sense that the most effective skin care be water based. Skin moisturization is a measure of water retention because water is moisture.

Facewater is extremely absorbing and skin compatible – and because Facewater is distilled - the purest form of water – it attracts toxins from your skin FREEING your pores and allowing beautiful clear skin to flourish.

settings.title: How long does it take to get my products and how much is shipping?
settings.text:
For any orders with 1 item: 

$5.00 - USPS First Class Mail in a Post Consumer Paper Padded Envelope: 2 - 7 business days

$10.00 - Upgrade to Fedex Standard in a Post Consumer Paper Padded Envelope: 1 - 3 business days

FREE SHIPPING WHEN YOU BUYS ANY 2 FULL SIZE ITEMS OR MORE:

USPS Priority Mail (in the Required Plastic Bubble Envelope): 2 - 5 business days

$5.00 - Upgrade to Fedex Standard in a Post Consumer Paper Padded Envelope: 1 - 3 business days

settings.title: Is there free shipping?
settings.text:
Yes, we offer free shipping when you buy any 2 full size items or more.

1 custom bundle is counted as 1 item.

Sample/travel size items do not count towards free shipping.

settings.title: Do you ship internationally?
settings.text: Unfortunately, we cannot ship internationally at this time.

settings.title: Do you ship to my area?
settings.text: We ship to anywhere in the U.S.

settings.title: Do you offer warranty for your products?
settings.text:
All our products are subject to quality control.

Our warranty provides a guarantee against manufacturer defects.

The guarantee covers any manufacturing, design, or material defect. Please notify us within 2 months of noticing any defects.

It does not cover blows, improper use, or other issues that are not attributable to a manufacturer defects.

settings.title: Do you offer extended warranty?
settings.text:
An extended warranty can be added to your products for an additional cost.

Please get in touch for more information about extended warranties.

settings.title: How much does extended warranty cost?
settings.text:
The extended warranty could come at a different cost depending on the type of product and extended period.

Please get in touch for more information.

settings.title: Do you offer refunds?
settings.text:
Yes, we offer full and partial refunds.

Please enquire for more information about our Refund policy.

settings.title: How long after I complete a purchase can I ask for a refund?
settings.text: A refund request can be submitted within a month after the purchase is made.

settings.title: How much can I get refunded?
settings.text:
In the case when the product and packaging are unopened and undamaged, you are eligible for a full refund.

In the case when the packaging has been opened and the product has been used, you are eligible for a partial refund.

In the case when a product has been damaged, and the damage is not covered by your warranty, you are not eligible for a refund.

settings.title: Who pays the shipping costs in the case of a refund when the order doesn't have free shipping?
settings.text: When an order does not include free shipping, all shipping costs (including the return shipping) are handled by the customer.

settings.title: Who pays the shipping costs in the case of a refund when the order has free shipping?
settings.text: When an order includes free shipping, only the cost of the return shipping is handled by the customer.

settings.title: Is my payment data safe with you?
settings.text: All direct payment gateways adhere to the standards set by PCI-DSS as managed by the PCI Security Standards Council, which is a joint effort of brands like Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and Discover.

settings.title: Do you accept online payments?
settings.text:
Yes, we accept online payments. All payment processing and vital customer information is quick, easy, and secure.

Learn more about our store's safe checkout experience (powered by Shopify) here.

settings.title: Where can I learn more about the payment and processing on your store?
settings.text: For more insight, you may also want to read Shopify’s Terms of Service here or Privacy Statement here.

settings.title: What forms of payment do you accept?
settings.text: We accept payments from major credit card companies like Visa, Mastercard, and American Express.
